briefTitle: A Study of Pegylated Interferon (PEG-IFN) Alfa-2a (Pegasys) in Participants With Chronic Hepatitis D (CHD)
officialTitle: Open-label, Multicenter, Trial Evaluating Efficacy and Safety of Peginterferon Alfa-2a (PEGASYSÂ®) in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis D (CHD)
summary: This study evaluated the efficacy and safety of 48-week treatment with pegylated interferon (PEG-IFN) alfa-2a (Pegasys) monotherapy in participants with chronic hepatitis D (CHD). Treatment was followed by 24 weeks of treatment-free follow-up.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Normal Alanine Aminotransferase (ALT) at Week 72
